title: Zigg's W indicator is missing
body:
Did Zigg's W indicator get a reverse QOL nerf so it appeared as a targeted ability rather than an AOE ground targeted skillshot? Because in my games, I no longer see the AOE indicator on his Satchel Charge. 

Thanks!

replies.body:
Hey TheLittleMatt,

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and working on a fix! :]
